bill_title: restrict the use of garnishment to collect stale judgments.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to restrict the use of garnishment to collect stale judgments. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 21-18 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No creditor may garnish the earnings of a judgment debtor to collect a judgment if the judgment is more than ten years old unless the creditor has made at least one bona fide, good faith attempt to collect the judgment by some means other than garnishment during the preceding six-month period. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
